title: Please Help with this font
content:
It looks very familiar, but can't just find it, could be modified.

Thanks again for all your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144737im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hooligan_4391.jpg)
author: Style Embroidery

comments.content: Isn’t it obvious that it isn’t a font?
you may be able to approximate this starting with [Vadtenkursive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144737/http:/www.fonts.com/font/monotype-imaging/vadstenakursive/regular). or just use as is :)

This lettering style is called Fraktur. Many fonts match it to a greater or lesser degree.  
You could start with [Luthersche Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415144737/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?309), or any of the others on the referenced list.  
Don
